notes: past participle (masculine singular); used with auxiliary avere
past participle (feminine singular); used with auxiliary avere
past participle (masculine plural); used with auxiliary avere
past participle (feminine plural); used with auxiliary avere

example_sentence_italian: Io pregavo sempre prima degli esami.
example_sentence_english: I used to pray always before exams.

translation_english: he was praying/she was praying/you (formal) were praying

example_sentence_italian: Ho pregato per la sua salute.
example_sentence_english: I have prayed for his health.

translation_english: he has prayed/she has prayed/you (formal) have prayed
notes: used with auxiliary avere; also used as formal 'Lei'

example_sentence_english: They have prayed for the victim.
